entry.title: Enpac 9140-BU - Rack Sump Inserts For Racks 96X36
entry.summary:
Vendor: Enpac
Type: Sump Inserts
Price: 2428.32

[shortdesc]
  • Designed to fit your pallet racks, this economical Sump Insert installs quickly and can help you comply with containment regulations while keeping you safe and spill-free! ENPAC's newest line brings heavy duty strength and security for storing and handling hazardous chemical Drums and IBC Totes! Our innovative designs provide long lasting compliant secondary spill containment for flammables and other hazardous chemicals
  • Key Features Include: •Certified leak-free with 100% inspected sump welds •Extra heavy gauge steel for extended life •Four-way forklift access •Galvanized steel grating •Durable chemical-resistant finish * Grounding Straps Available.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Enpac
    Product Type Sump Inserts
